name: Tales Of Everwar: Arena Of The Ice King
name_original: Tales Of Everwar: Arena Of The Ice King
description:
This game is a prequel to TOE: Pixie's Adventure: https://castimierdev.itch.io/tales-of-everwar-pixies-adventure (there isn't a very big connection other than that they are in the same world)

Controls:

movement: player 1 (warrior): arrow keys

movement: player 2 (slime): wads

attack: player 1: left mouse or right control key

attack: player 2: space

Story:

In the Frozen Era of the long history of Everwar, a continent at this time united by the Mighty Ice King Of Giants: Nifjot, there was a great arena where prisoners had to fight to the death or score more points by hitting the door on the other side. 

The person who first had 5 points won, and the one who lost... wouldn't ever be heard from again...

Humans against monsters, Dark Elves against elemental beasts.... WHO WILL WIN?! Or should I say... who will survive?

Versions: 

There are multiple versions, one that is dependent on the .NET framework so you'll need to download the runtime for it to work. You have a Windows x86, OSX, and Linux (only windows tested) versions which don't depent on the .NET framework.
